name: macos-info
title: macOS Information
description: Shows Mac hardware and software information including model, chip, RAM, OS version, boot info and more.
author: birkhoff

commands.name: hardware-overview
commands.title: Hardware Overview
commands.subtitle: macOS Information
commands.description: Shows Mac Model Name, Identifier/Number, chip, ram and other information like serial numbers.

commands.name: software-overview
commands.title: Software Overview
commands.subtitle: macOS Information
commands.description: Shows macOS version and other software-related information.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
